congVote.dailyDigestSummary: Senate resumed consideration of the nomination of Thomas Price, of Georgia, to be Secretary of Health and Human Services.<P/>During consideration of this nomination today, Senate also took the following action:<P/>By 51 yeas to 48 nays (Vote No. 60), Senate agreed to the motion to close further debate on the nomination.
